text: Nello Fabbri (15 March 1934 - 30 January 2020) was an Italian professional racing cyclist.L'As Roma Ciclismo piange Nello Fabbri He rode in the 1959 and 1960 Tour de France. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Cyclists from Rome Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Nello Fabbri
